name: Regular Etimo Hooks Set
description:
Get HOOKED on Etimo!! You want them, we’ve got them! 

Here’s what the manufacturer says about them;
“You are able to hook the yarn easily with smooth head and has soft cushion grip.

The ergonomic shape grip that developed independently by Tulip is very comfortable to hold and tireless.

This soft cushion grip use elastomer and its texture is very soft.

ETIMO gives you smooth crocheting and fits comfortably in your hand. “

Smooth hook tip
The finely polished hook tip provides a smooth feel to crocheting without catching on the threads.
Cushion grip
A special rubber material is used which fits gently onto the fingers, greatly reducing the load which the fingers bear.

Easy-to-grip shape
The shape of this hook was developed independently by Tulip, and is easy to hold, easy to turn, and does not slip.

The set includes;
8 hooks
High grade scissors (handle color may differ from pictures)
ruler
2 needles

Hook sizes are;
D-3/3.25 mm
E-4/3.50 mm
F-5/3.75 mm
G-6/4.00 mm
7/4.50 mm
H-8/5.00 mm
I-9/5.50 mm
J-10/6.00 mm

The case is made of wool, viscose & pvc resin & folds & closes with a snap. There is also a zippered compartment for all those small items needed for your crochet project.

FREE shipping in United States!!!!

name: Individual Etimo Soft Grip Crochet Hook
description:
FREE shipping in US, other countries please email for shipping quote!

You want them, we’ve got them! See what designer Doris Chan & others are talking about when they gave rave reviews for these wonderful, ergonomically designed hooks.

Here’s what the manufacturer says about them;

“You are able to hook the yarn easily with smooth head and has soft cushion grip.

The ergonomic shape grip that developed independently by Tulip is very comfortable to hold and tireless.

This soft cushion grip use elastomer and its texture is very soft.

ETIMO gives you smooth knitting and fits comfortably in your hand. “


Smooth hook tip
The finely polished hook tip provides a smooth feel to crocheting without catching on the threads.

Cushion grip
A special rubber material is used which fits gently onto the fingers, greatly reducing the load which the fingers bear.
Easy-to-grip shape
The shape of this hook was developed independently by Tulip, and is easy to hold, easy to turn, and does not slip.

This listing is for ONE individual hook.

As always, please email me with questions & thank you for stopping by!

name: Bamboo Handle Steel Crochet Hook Set
description:
This beautiful set of hooks includes the following sizes for all of your thread crochet needs;
1.00 mm
1.25 mm
1.50 mm
1.75 mm
2.00 mm
2.25 mm
2.50 mm
2.75 mm

The handles are made from renewable bamboo with the size engraved on each hook handle in both beautiful Chinese characters as well English. Each hook measures about 5 1/2" long.

Each set comes in a zippered vinyl carrying case.

FREE shipping in the United States!!
